short_summary: Height adjustable desk instalation for 28th March
description: The department of Public Services and procurement of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide height-adjustable office furniture and installation in Prince Edward Island
tags: Select several award of a contract
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
[Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products](#freestanding-height-adjustable-desktablurelativeto Tables)


## Announcement Information

| Field Name  | Value          |
|-------------|----------------|
| Reference No| CB-894-32392834 |
| Amendment No | 5              |
| Solicitation No  | 3000771750     |
| Publication Date | 2023-12-13     |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-12-29T10:00:00  |
| Amendment Date  | 2023-12-29      |
| Expected Start Date | 2024-01-05      |
| Tender Status | Expired        |

## Notice Information
This is a Request for Proposal for the purchase, delivery, and installation of freestanding height adjustable desks in Prince Edward Island.

## Product Information

The following UNSPSC codes apply to this tender:
* Office furniture
* Desks
* Freestanding furniture
* Freestanding tables
* Service of office furniture installation or reconfiguration

## Procurement Details
* Trade Agreements: None
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Prince Edward Island
* Contracting Entity: Veterans Affairs Canada
* Contracting Entity Address:
    Charlottetown, PE
    C1A 8M9
    Canada
* Contacts:
    Lynn Paulin
    Email: [lynn.paulin@veterans.gc.ca](mailto:lynn.paulin@veterans.gc.ca)
    Phone: (782) 377-4105

## Notice Documents
The full notice can be viewed at [Tender Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27444/3000771750-npp_0.pdf)

## Tender Description

Veterans Affairs Canada invites proposals from companies interested in procuring, delivering, and installing height-adjustable desks in Prince Edward Island by 28 March 2024.  Please review the attached tender notice and related documentation in the enclosure for further details.

CONTRACT TYPE
Veterans Affairs Canada is soliciting bids for one contract.
PROPOSAL SUBMISSION
Proposals must be submitted electronically through [Canada Buys](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-proposal).
 DEADLINE FOR SUBMISSION
Proposal submission deadline is 2023-12-29T10:00:00.
